title: Hunter
brief_description: In this 2D hand-drawn animation The Hunter, the animator uses stereotypical images (remniscent of the 50’s hollywood animation)of a tribal African wandering through the desert in search of a party. Whilst wearing shoes made from coconuts the man puts a bucket on his head and is then shot by a hunter.
